pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Elegant Approach to Summarizing Clinical Data // Streamlines the analysis of clinical data by automatically selecting appropriate statistical descriptions and inference methods based on variable types. For method details see Motulsky H J (2016) https://www.graphpad.com/guides/prism/10/statistics/index.htm and d'Agostino R B (1971) doi:10.1093/biomet/58.2.341.
